pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Link Grammar Parser is a syntactic parser of English, Russian, Arabic and Persian (and other languages as well), based on Link Grammar, an original theory of syntax and morphology. Given a sentence, the system assigns to it a syntactic structure, which consists of a set of labelled links connecting pairs of words. The parser also produces a "constituent" (HPSG style phrase tree) representation of a sentence (showing noun phrases, verb phrases, etc.).
